Package battle.logic

package battle.logic
  • Class
    Description
    Battle
    The Battle class represents a PokÃ©mon battle between two trainers.
    BattleObserver
    Interface for observing the end of a battle.
    Evolution
    Represents the evolution details of a Pokemon, including its name and the level at which it evolves.
    GameLogic
    Manages the game logic for a battle between two trainers and their Pokemon.
    GameObserver
    Interface for observing updates in the game.
    LearnMoveButtonListener
    This class handles the action of a trainer learning a new move.
    MoveButtonListener
    This class handles the action of a trainer's PokÃ©mon using a move during a battle.
    MoveEffects
    This class manages the effects of moves used in battles between Pokemon.
    Pokemon
    This class represents a PokÃ©mon with its attributes and methods for battle mechanics.
    PokemonButtonListener
    This class implements the ActionListener interface to handle events when a PokÃ©mon button is clicked.
    Trainer
    The Trainer class represents a PokÃ©mon trainer with a team of PokÃ©mon, a name, and a trainer level.
    Type
     
    TypeEV
    The TypeEV enum represents the different types of Effort Values (EVs) that a PokÃ©mon can gain.
